description: The Eko Spichlerz initiative in Gdansk, Poland, is a community-focused grocery shop and dietetic practice. It offers organic and eco-friendly products while promoting healthy eating through workshops for children. The initiative emphasizes education, sustainability, and community support, providing personalized dietary guidance for adults and fostering a culture of healthy cooking among children. Eco Spichlech aims to reconnect people with natural food practices and enhance local well-being.
name: Eko Spichlerz
